spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placements are generally correct. Wall alignment shows minor inaccuracies in several areas, particularly curved walls and some corner junctions. Door placements are largely correct but some orientations are off. Window placements are frequently incorrect or missing. Room proportions are mostly preserved, but some minor inconsistencies are visible.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is somewhat consistent but not perfectly uniform across the entire render. Door embedding is mostly correct but some doors appear to float or have gaps. Adjacency relationships are mostly maintained. No missing rooms, but missing elements within rooms. No hallucinated rooms, but hallucinated architectural elements like extra windows are present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate according to the floor plan. Furniture scale consistency is fair, though some items like beds appear slightly smaller relative to the room.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera correctness and orthographic projection accuracy are good. Lighting quality is decent but lacks depth. Geometry is generally clean with few distortions, but some curves are jagged. Visual clarity and composition are good.

detected_errors.description: Wall alignment inaccuracies, especially for curved wall sections and internal corners.
Incorrect door orientation in several locations (e.g., top-left bedroom, bottom-right bedroom).
Missing windows in the top-left room.
Misplaced windows in the top-right bedroom (different location from floor plan).
Hallucinated windows in the bottom-left exterior wall of the kitchen area, and along the right side of the house where a window should not be present based on the floor plan.
Slight proportion distortion in some rooms, making them appear slightly narrower or shorter than indicated by the floor plan.
Door embedding inconsistencies, with some doors not seamlessly integrated into walls.
Minor scale inconsistencies in furniture items, making beds appear slightly undersized.
